items.label: 539fc4a4ec4f024c27d8c933
items.description:
This rate is available for private residences, individual apartments, condominiums, and condominium common areas where electricity is used for domestic purposes including lighting, heating, space heating, and incidental power.    This rate is available for service to any non-business use that resides on a residential property where an existing residential meter simultaneously exists.  This rate is available for private residences, individual apartments, condominiums, and condominium common areas where electricity is used for domestic purposes including lighting, heating, space heating, and incidental power.

Rate 5 users are receiving Supplemental Security Income from the Social Security Administration and are eligible to receive a credit equal to the monthly service charge on their bill
Monthly usage of less than 300kwh attract different f service charge as follows:
The Service Charge will be billed per meter and is calculated as follows:
For consumption of 0 to 200 kwh/mo the Service Charge is $9.70.
For consumption of 201 to 300 kwh/mo the Service Charge is $9.70 + [(Consumption - 200) x $0.027].
items.name: RESIDENTIAL SERVICE - GENERAL
